title: Looking for Serious Team-Plat 5-ADC Main

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: I play most AD Carries, looking for a serious team to learn the game better and advance on my gameplay, my IGN is also flavehh so if you have any questions add me <3

replies.body: A few of my Diamond/Plat friends and I are looking into making a ranked team. You interested?
